title: OLUGBALA JESU KRISTI (OUR LORD JESUS CHRIST)
author: Traditional Igbo liturgical chant
source: Not listed on hymnary.org (regional Igbo liturgical hymn; verify with local sources)

sections.title: Opening Verse
content: Olugbala Jesu Kristi, meta lokan O,
A more wa 0, wa bore wa.

sections.title: Chorus (Refrain)
content: A more wa 0 (2X), Baba Loke, 0 ba mimo
Karowa Jaiye 0 (2X), Baba Loke, 0 ba mimo
Dariji wa 0 (2X), Baba Loke, 0 ba mimo

sections.title: Closing Verse
content: Omo niyi Omo nide, Omo Lade,
Orien Fun wa nitawo, Oba mimo.
